Variant Name: Verona - 36 inch Prestige Series Freestanding Double Oven Electric Range with 5 Elements, 3.5 cu. ft. Total Oven Capacity, European Convection (Matte Black) - VPFSEE365DE
Variant HTML:
Featuring a sleek, professional appearance and top-notch performance, this 36-inch Prestige Electric Double Oven Range boasts a black ceramic cooktop with five multi-purpose elements and seven different cooking modes for its multi-function convection ovens.

Electric double oven range by Prestige, 36" wide

Adding to the Prestige Collection of 36-inch Ranges, Verona's Electric Range offers professional-grade styling with enhanced power capabilities.


Smartly Designed 5-Burner Ceramic Stovetop in Black

The sleek black ceramic 5-burner stovetop has full-sized elements that can handle pots of any size, and it has a dual element that can switch between a PrefectSimmerTM (700W) and an InstaBoilTM (2100W) setting with the touch of a button.


Huge, Power-Saving Electric Cooktops

Equipped with a full-width storage compartment and a powerful multi-function convection oven with seven cooking modes, these large, energy-efficient electric ovens help you prepare meals faster and tastier.


Highlights of the Stovetop

  • 5 Heat Sources/Regions
  • 2-1/2" - 1,200 W
  • 2,700 W - 6-7/8"
  • 9", 2,100W, or 700W


Key Features of the Oven

  • Various Uses
  • Size of the oven in cubic feet 2.2
  • Indoor Broiling
  • Cook stovetop
  • Charcoal Oven Power - 2,000 W
  • Power Required for the Oven - 2,400 W
  • Atlantic Oscillation
  • Elements for Convection—2,450 WI
  • One motorized fan
  • Accessory Glide Stool
  • With two pullout racks
  • Cooking Skillet


Elements of the Second Oven

  • Two-Oven Multi-Functional
  • The second oven has a capacity of 1.3 cubic feet.
  • Second oven for closed-door broiling
  • Second oven for radiant broiling
  • The second oven's broiler power is 1,450 W.
  • Two-Oven Power: 1,500 W
  • Second oven for European convection
  • Second Oven's Convection Element—2,450 W
  • Two oven racks
  • Pan for Broiling (Second Oven)




Freight Charges May Apply

Features

  • The Five Components
    • It has five heating elements, so you can cook a lot of food at once, and it's very versatile.
  • Drawer with Full Width for Storage
    • Makes it easy to store cookware, which helps to keep your kitchen organized and free of clutter.
  • Total Oven Capacity: 3.5 Cu. Ft.
    • Big meals can be baked, roasted, or broiled in the roomy oven.
  • An Oven Handle Made of Stainless Steel
    • The sleek design is complemented by a durable and stylish handle that provides a comfortable grip.
  • Two Multi-Use Convection Ovens
    • The even distribution of heat in a dual oven makes it possible to cook a wide variety of foods.

Featuring a sleek, professional appearance and top-notch performance, this 36-inch Prestige Electric Double Oven Range boasts a black ceramic cooktop with five multi-purpose elements and seven different cooking modes for its multi-function convection ovens.

Adding to the Prestige Collection of 36-inch Ranges, Verona's Electric Range offers professional-grade styling with enhanced power capabilities.

The sleek black ceramic 5-burner stovetop has full-sized elements that can handle pots of any size, and it has a dual element that can switch between a PrefectSimmerTM (700W) and an InstaBoilTM (2100W) setting with the touch of a button.


Huge, Power-Saving Electric Cooktops

Equipped with a full-width storage compartment and a powerful multi-function convection oven with seven cooking modes, these large, energy-efficient electric ovens help you prepare meals faster and tastier.


Functions of the Stovetop

  • 5-Zone Burner System
  • 2.5 inches - 1,200 watts**
  • 2,700 W - 6-7/8"
  • 9 inches - 2,100W / 700W


Key Ingredients for the Oven

  • Multiple Uses
  • Cooking Area (Cu. Ft.) 2.2
  • Covered-Case Grilling
